metadata.title: Physical, Chemical and Biological Oceanography of the Haida Eddy, 1999-2000
metadata.description: A study of the physical, biological, and chemical oceanographic characteristics of eddies originating off the Queen Charlotte Islands heading out to the deep ocean.  Feb, June, Sept 2000 (main study of Haida 2000).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Observing the biological, chemical, and physical oceanography of an eddy event off the coast of British Columbia.

Supplemental Information: Priority: 4
Priority Justification: Null
Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre. Data in various formats and not well backed up (ie, multiple media stored in separate locations)
Risk of Loss: Medium
Impact Justification: Data are related to a subject, location or species of concern within the scientific,  government or public community within the last 5 years.
Impact of Loss: Medium
Recommended Action: Bring rest of data to archives when available.
Additional Info: Part of Line P cruises.

Status: In work

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: May Be Private

Use constraints: May be subject to proprietary period restrictions to access

Distribution liability: [unknown]
